item.title: Melissa add a quote by Danny Kaye
item.description: "Life is a blank canvas, and you need to throw all the paint on it you can." -- Danny Kaye

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Albert Camus
item.description: "A person's life purpose is nothing more than to rediscover, through the detours of art or love or passionate work, those one or two images in the presence of which his heart first opened." -- Albert Camus

item.title: Melissa add a quote by John Gardner
item.description: "Life is the art of drawing without an eraser." -- John Gardner

item.title: Melissa add a quote by madeline L'engel
item.description: "God understands that part of us which is more than what we think we are." -- madeline L'engel

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Mother Teresa
item.description: "If you judge people, you have no time to love them." -- Mother Teresa

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Laurel Thatcher Ulrich
item.description: "Well-behaved women seldom make history." -- Laurel Thatcher Ulrich

item.title: Melissa add a quote by John F. Kennedy
item.description: "Forgive your enemies, but never forget their names." -- John F. Kennedy

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "He who has a why to live for can bear almost any how." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Thomas Paine
item.description: "A long habit of not thinking a thing wrong, gives it a superficial appearance of being right, and raises at first a formidable outcry in defense of custom. But the tumult soon subsides. Time makes more converts than reason." -- Thomas Paine

item.title: Melissa add a quote by W. Somerset Maugham
item.description: "We are not the same persons this year as last; nor are those we love. It is a happy chance if we, changing, continue to love a changed person." -- W. Somerset Maugham

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Antoine de Saint-Exupéry
item.description: "Love does not consist of gazing at each other, but in looking outward together in the same direction." -- Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Mae West
item.description: "You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough." -- Mae West

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Ethel Watts Mumford
item.description: "Knowledge is power...if you know it about the right person." -- Ethel Watts Mumford

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Oscar Wilde (attributed to)
item.description: "Some cause happiness wherever they go; others whenever they go." -- Oscar Wilde (attributed to)

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Napoleon Bonaparte
item.description: "Never interrupt your enemy when he is making a mistake." -- Napoleon Bonaparte

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Sun Tzu
item.description: "Opportunities multiply as they are seized." -- Sun Tzu

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Mary Tyler Moore
item.description: "You can't be brave if you've only had wonderful things happen to you." -- Mary Tyler Moore

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Koran
item.description: "He deserves Paradise who makes his companions laugh." -- Koran

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Whoopi Goldberg
item.description: "I don't have pet peeves like some people. I have whole kennels of irritation." -- Whoopi Goldberg

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Judith Martin
item.description: "If you can't be kind, at least be vague." -- Judith Martin

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Elizabeth Taylor
item.description: "Success is a great deodorant." -- Elizabeth Taylor

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Marjorie Kinnan Rawlings
item.description: "A woman has got to love a bad man once or twice in her life, to be thankful for a good one." -- Marjorie Kinnan Rawlings

item.title: Melissa add a quote by George Bernard Shaw
item.description: "If you cannot get rid of the family skeleton, you may as well make it dance." -- George Bernard Shaw
